test-case.name: fn-error-1
test-case.description: Evaluation of "fn:error" function with no arguments

test-case.name: fn-error-2
test-case.description: Evaluation of "fn:error" function as per example 2 from the Funcs. and Ops. Specifications.
test-case.test: fn:error(fn:QName('http://www.example.com/HR', 'myerr:toohighsal'), 'Does not apply because salary is too high')

test-case.name: fn-error-3
test-case.description: Evaluation of "fn:error" function with wrong argument type.

test-case.name: fn-error-4
test-case.description: Evaluation of "fn:error" for error code "FOCH0004".

test-case.name: fn-error-5
test-case.description: Evaluation of "fn:error" with first argument set to empty string for 3rd signature.

test-case.name: fn-error-6
test-case.description: Evaluation of "fn:error" with first argument set to empty string for 4rd signature.
test-case.test: fn:error((), 'err:FOER0000','error raised by this test by setting first argument to empty sequence')

test-case.description: Evaluation of "fn:error" set to raise error "FODT0001".

test-case.name: K-ErrorFunc-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `if(true()) then true() else error()`.

test-case.name: K-ErrorFunc-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `if(true()) then true() else error(QName("", "local"), "description")`.

test-case.name: K-ErrorFunc-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `error(QName("", "local"), "description", "object", "wrong param")`.

test-case.name: K-ErrorFunc-4
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `error( () )`.

test-case.name: K-ErrorFunc-4a
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `error( () )`.

test-case.name: K-ErrorFunc-5
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `error(QName('http://www.w3.org/2005/xqt-errors', 'err:FOER0000'))`.

test-case.name: K-ErrorFunc-6
test-case.description: When fn:error() is passed a description, the first argument may be an empty sequence.

test-case.name: K-ErrorFunc-7
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `if(false()) then error((), "description") else true()`.

test-case.name: K-ErrorFunc-8
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `error()`.

test-case.name: K-ErrorFunc-9
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `error(QName("", "XPDY6666"), "description", "error object")`.

test-case.name: K-ErrorFunc-10
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `exactly-one((true(), error()))`.

test-case.name: K2-ErrorFunc-1
test-case.description: Combine fn:error() with a predicate.

test-case.name: K2-ErrorFunc-2
test-case.description: Using a QName with namespace 'none' as identifier.

test-case.name: K2-ErrorFunc-3
test-case.description: Use a QName with no namespace URI.

test-case.name: cbcl-error-001
test-case.description: fn:error() might never be evaluated here
test-case.test: declare function local:ignore($arg) { true() }; local:ignore( fn:error() )

test-case.description: fn:error() might never be evaluated here

test-case.name: cbcl-error-026
test-case.description: fn:error() might never be evaluated here the static type of the conditional expression is empty
test-case.test: empty( if (current-date() lt xs:date('2009-01-01')) then fn:error() else ())

test-case.name: cbcl-error-027
test-case.description: fn:error() might never be evaluated here the static type of the conditional expression is empty
test-case.test: empty( if (current-date() lt xs:date('2009-01-01')) then () else fn:error())

test-case.name: cbcl-error-028
test-case.description: fn:error() might never be evaluated here the static type of the typeswitch expression is empty
test-case.test: declare function local:item() { if (current-date() lt xs:date('2012-10-10')) then 1 else "one" }; empty( typeswitch ( local:item() ) case xs:integer return fn:error() default return ())

test-case.name: cbcl-error-029
test-case.description: fn:error() might never be evaluated here the static type of the typeswitch expression is empty
test-case.test: declare function local:item() { if (current-date() gt xs:date('1900-01-01')) then 1 else "one" }; empty( typeswitch ( local:item() ) case xs:integer return () default return fn:error())

test-case.name: cbcl-error-030
test-case.description: fn:error() might never be evaluated here the static type of the fn:remove call is empty

test-case.name: cbcl-error-031
test-case.description: fn:error() might never be evaluated here the static type of the fn:remove call is empty

test-case.name: cbcl-error-032
test-case.description: fn:error() might never be evaluated here the static type of the except operator is empty

test-case.name: cbcl-error-033
test-case.description: fn:error() might never be evaluated here the static type of the intersect operator is empty

test-case.name: cbcl-error-034
test-case.description: fn:error() might never be evaluated here the static type of fn:zero-or-one call is empty

test-case.name: cbcl-error-035
test-case.description: fn:error() might never be evaluated here the static type of the treat as expression is empty
